get.description: This endpoint retrieves all shipments available to your API client in a CSV format.

parameters.name: filter[search]
parameters.description:
String of characters you want to look for in a shipment's attributes. Available fields to look in are:
  • `date_created` (YYYY-MM-DD). Deprecated use `filter[date_from]` and `filter[date_to]` instead.
  • `description`
  • `customer_reference`
  • `recipient_address`
  • `tracking_code`

parameters.name: filter[customer_reference]
parameters.description: Search for a shipment by its customer reference attribute. This is a strict search, meaning that only if the search string matches the `customer_reference` attribute of a shipment completely, will the shipment be returned.

parameters.name: filter[date_from]
parameters.description: Date string in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Only shipments created at >= this date will be in the response.

parameters.name: filter[date_to]
parameters.description: Date string in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Only shipments created at <= this date will be in the response.

parameters.name: filter[shop]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of shop ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[organization]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of organization ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[carrier]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of carrier ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[current_status_code]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of status codes to filter by. Only shipments with the a current status that corresponds with one of the status codes will be in the response.

parameters.name: filter[service_code]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of service codes to filter by. Only shipments with a service that corresponds with one of the service codes will be in the response.

parameters.name: filter[recipient_address][country_code]
parameters.description: Two letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the recipient address to filter the shipments by.

parameters.name: filter[sender_address][country_code]
parameters.description: Two letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the sender address to filter the shipments by.

200.description: Retrieved the CSV containing shipment details
